contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Boost Site Speed Using Image Processing for Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Kentico MVP Liam Goldfinch has authored a new Xperience by Kentico open-source integration - XperienceCommunity.ImageProcessing - to help teams optimize image asset delivery for media stored in Xperience's Content hub. In this short blog post Liam gives some background on the project.
